name: eBezard
description: The all-in-one platform to digitalize your business.
longDescription: eBezard is the all-in-one platform to digitalize your business and find new customers. Discover how to simplify management, increase sales, and access innovative tools.
faqRegisterA: Click 'Join' and follow the guided procedure to create your account.
faqFreeQ: Can I try the platform for free?
faqFreeA: Yes, a Free plan with basic features is available.
faqSupportA: Support is available via email and chat for Pro and Enterprise plans.
